reviews.review: Wholesome Game about friendship and caring about each other.

I have played this game for a long time (different account) and I think it is a pretty good game. It is really hard to have fun with though with trust factor and other bs systems. Unplayable without prime.
Афигенная игра,я как Майнкрафтер всем рекомендую
its a nice first person shooter
It is an awsome game with good graphics but if u get low trust you will play cheters only!
Ótimo adoro perder o tempo que eu podeira gastar estudando :)
Muito bom , morro mitas vezes mais estou ficando melhor
Too many hackers in the game (in higher ranks idk about lower ranks) and nothing is done even though im playing in prime games.
great performance, fun to play with friends

Great game, but...
...too many hackers, my guess is that report is just there and doesnt do shit to get rid of them.
To be honest, I liked cs: source more and don't understand why ppl went to cs:go beside for crates...
I also think that cs: source also had a better community...

Will I continue to play the game...maybe...idk...

Buen juego. Deberia haberle copiado mas cosas al valorant
Прекрасное продолжение легендарных игр, после 200 часов стоит идти на FACEIT или ESEA, если вы раскидываете врагов направо и налево. Читеров слишком много в ММ.
you'll die in a dumb way and u cant do anything about it for at least 1000 hours + so if u wanna just play this game casualy your not really gonna have fun at all.

Conhecido por todos, bom nivel de desafio, mas está infestado de jogadores usuarios de hack.
Não recomendo a compra a não ser q seja jogado em servers privados fora da Steam.
Playing for last 5 Years. Enjoyed CS GO!

Great game to rebound or start with when first switching pc to develop aim and skill

Best competitive FPS game period. But the cheaters specially in the middle east and Asia region ruin the game, as they have no life and aspiration to be better in the game which is sad and loss of potential for the region to discover talent.
Jogo muito bom! Recomendo, tenho 800 horas de jogo e nunca enjoei, apesar de sentir a falta de operações. Lança Operação nova dona Valve, nunca pedi nada!!!
